AT.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
AT.description: Das tief in den Bergen liegende, kleine Dorf Aslarga wird zum Dreh- und Angelpunkt für Abenteurer, die in den Mystery Dungeons auf der Suche nach Ruhm und Reichtum sind. Doch düstere Herausforderungen erwarten selbst die tapfersten Abenteurer in Etrian Mystery Dungeon, einem schurkenhaften, rundenbasierten Action-RPG entwickelt von ATLUS und Spike Chunsoft.

AU.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
AU.description: Far off in the mountains, the small village Aslarga becomes a hub for adventurers looking for fame and fortune from the Mystery Dungeons. But dire challenges await even the most stalwart adventurers in Etrian Mystery Dungeon, a turn-based action RPG roguelike developed by ATLUS and Spike Chunsoft. The Nintendo 3DS™ exclusive mixes Etrian Odyssey’s vast RPG party and skill customization aspects, and Mystery Dungeon’s infinitely random dungeon adventures. The action/turn based combat means that battling monsters is not just about using the right skills, but becomes an elegant Pas de Quatre of strategic positioning. Players form their parties with familiar Etrian Odyssey classes, customize individuals using Etrian-style skill trees, and then take up to four members into the dungeons. Always randomized with various levels and paths, the dungeons require plenty of exploration, not to mention the incredible loot rewards -- just be wary of what waits among the deepest depths.

BG.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
BG.description: Far off in the mountains, the small village Aslarga becomes a hub for adventurers looking for fame and fortune from the Mystery Dungeons. But dire challenges await even the most stalwart adventurers in Etrian Mystery Dungeon, a turn-based action RPG roguelike developed by ATLUS and Spike Chunsoft. The Nintendo 3DS™ exclusive mixes Etrian Odyssey’s vast RPG party and skill customization aspects, and Mystery Dungeon’s infinitely random dungeon adventures. The action/turn based combat means that battling monsters is not just about using the right skills, but becomes an elegant Pas de Quatre of strategic positioning. Players form their parties with familiar Etrian Odyssey classes, customize individuals using Etrian-style skill trees, and then take up to four members into the dungeons. Always randomized with various levels and paths, the dungeons require plenty of exploration, not to mention the incredible loot rewards - just be wary of what waits among the deepest depths.

BE.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
BE.description: Au loin, dans les montagnes, le petit village Aslarga devient une plaque tournante pour les aventuriers en quête de gloire et de fortune dans Mystery Dungeons. Mais des défis extrêmes attendent même les aventuriers les plus vaillants dans Etrian Mystery Dungeon, une action RPG au tour par tour développée par ATLUS et Spike Chunsoft. L'exclusif Nintendo 3DS™ mélange la grande partie RPG et les aspects personnalisés liés aux compétences de Etrian Mystery, et les aventures de donjon aléatoires infinies de Mystery Dungeon. Le combat basé sur l'action / tour signifie que combattre les monstres n’est pas seulement une question de l'utilisation des compétences adéquates, mais devient un élégant Pas de Quatre de positionnement stratégique. Les joueurs forment leurs parties avec les classes familières de Etrian Odyssey, comme Landsknecht et Runemaster, personnalisent les individus en utilisant des arbres de compétences de style Etrian, puis prennent jusqu'à quatre membres dans les donjons.

ES.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
ES.description: Más allá de las montañas, el pueblecito de Aslarga se ha convertido en un punto de encuentro para los aventureros en busca de la fama y la fortuna que otorgan las Mystery Dungeons. Más les vale no confiarse, pues desafíos muy peliagudos pondrán en apuros hasta al aventurero más curtido en Etrian Mystery Dungeon, un juego de rol por turnos centrado en la exploración de mazmorras, fruto de la colaboración de ATLUS y Spike Chunsoft.

IT.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
IT.description: Lontano sui monti, il piccolo villaggio di Aslarga diviene un centro per avventurieri in cerca di fama e fortuna nei Mystery Dungeons. Ma pericolose sfide attendono anche gli avventurieri più determinati in Etrian Mystery Dungeon, un RPG a turni in stile rouguelike sviluppato da ATLUS e Spike Chunsoft.

PT.name: Etrian Mystery Dungeon
PT.description: Distante nas montanhas, a pequena vila Aslarga torna-se um centro para aventureiros buscando por fama e fortuna dos Mystery Dungeons. Mas terríveis desafios estão à espera mesmo dos mais intrépidos aventureiros em Etrian Mystery Dungeon, um RPG de ação roguelike baseado em turnos, desenvolvido pela ATLUS e Spike Chunsoft. O jogo exclusivo para Nintendo 3DS™ mistura os aspectos de vasto grupo de RPG e personalização de habilidades de Etrian Odyssey com as aventuras infinitamente aleatórias das masmorras de Mystery Dungeon. Não há ajuda em Etrian Mystery Dungeon. Um combate de ação/baseado em turnos significa que para lutar contra monstros não basta apenas usar as habilidades certas, mas é necessária também uma elegante valsa de posicionamento estratégico. Jogadores formam seus grupos com as classes familiares de Etrian Odyssey, personalizam indivíduos usando árvores de habilidade ao estilo Etrian, e levam até quatro membros para as masmorras.

The Nintendo 3DS™ exclusive mixes Etrian Odyssey’s vast RPG party and skill customization aspects, and Mystery Dungeon’s infinitely random dungeon adventures. The action/turn based combat means that battling monsters is not just about using the right skills, but becomes an elegant Pas de Quatre of strategic positioning. Players form their parties with familiar Etrian Odyssey classes, customize individuals using Etrian-style skill trees, and then take up to four members into the dungeons.
